name: wp-autoboiler
description: WP AutoBoiler is WordPress starter tempalte.
author: E2M Solutions

scripts.compile:css: node-sass sass/ -o ./ && stylelint '*.css' --fix || true && cleancss -o style.min.css style.css
scripts.compile:rtl: rtlcss style.css style-rtl.css && cleancss -o style-rtl.min.css style-rtl.css
scripts.bundle: dir-archiver --src . --dest ../wp-autoboiler.zip --exclude .DS_Store .stylelintrc.json .eslintrc .git .gitattributes .github .gitignore README.md composer.json composer.lock node_modules vendor package-lock.json package.json .travis.yml phpcs.xml.dist sass style.css.map yarn.lock
